template.name: Responder
Victim
Drone
template.parameter: const id_d_t id, const int[0,5] Nv

template.name: Survivor

query.formula: Pr[<= T_scs] (<> (sum(s : id_s_t) Survivor(s).Safe + sum(v : id_v_t) Victim(v).Safe) >= ((SURVIVORS_QTY+VICTIMS_QTY)*25/100) and globalTime <= T_scs)

plot.title: Probability Density Distribution
plot.comment: Parameters: α=0.05, ε=0.05, bucket width=0.10853, bucket count=9 Runs: 72 in total, 72 (100%) displayed, 0 (0%) remaining Span of displayed sample: [4.0034, 4.9801] Mean estimate of displayed sample: 4.4705 ± 0.066527 (95% CI)

query.formula: Pr[<= T_scs] (<> (sum(s : id_s_t) Survivor(s).Safe + sum(v : id_v_t) Victim(v).Safe) >= ((SURVIVORS_QTY+VICTIMS_QTY)*50/100) and globalTime <= T_scs)

query.formula: Pr[<= T_scs] (<> (sum(s : id_s_t) Survivor(s).Safe + sum(v : id_v_t) Victim(v).Safe) >= ((SURVIVORS_QTY+VICTIMS_QTY)) and globalTime <= T_scs)

query.formula: Pr[<= 1000] ([] forall(i : id_s_t) not Survivor(i).Safe imply map[survivors[i].x][survivors[i].y] != FIRE and forall(i : id_v_t) not Victim(i).Safe imply map[victims[i].x][victims[i].y] != FIRE and forall(i : id_f_t) map[responders[i].x][responders[i].y] != FIRE )
